meanings.sent1: The baby was undressed for bath time.
meanings.sent2: She felt embarrassed when she realized she was undressed in public.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally left the house undressed for the costume party.
meanings.sent4: The trees looked undressed without their leaves in winter.
meanings.sent5: The knight stood undressed in front of the dragon, ready for battle.

meanings.sent1: The cake was undressed because it was missing frosting.
meanings.sent2: She felt unprepared and undressed for the important presentation.
meanings.sent3: The undressed project caused chaos in the office meeting.
meanings.sent4: His undressed speech lacked the impactful conclusion it needed.
meanings.sent5: The undressed plan left them stranded in the middle of nowhere.
